pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 18, 2016:

Ottawa

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 23rd Canadian Legislative Conference of the International Association of Fire Fighters with Minister Goodale and will deliver remarks.

Delta Ottawa City Centre
Ballroom C
101 Lyon Street North
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive for 8:30 a.m

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
